reviews.customers_say: Customers love the oversized fit of this sweater and find it comfortable with perfect sizing. Customers like the range of color options available, with one highlighting the attractive black and white tiger print.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Perfect Sweater for Cozy and Stylish Days
items.body: I am absolutely thrilled with my purchase. This sweater has quickly become my go-to choice for cozy and stylish days. First and foremost, let's talk about the comfort factor. The sweater is made from a high-quality knit fabric that feels incredibly soft against the skin. It provides the perfect amount of warmth without feeling too heavy or bulky. The loose and oversized fit adds to the overall comfort, allowing for ease of movement and a relaxed feel. The design of this sweater is both trendy and versatile. The batwing sleeves give it a unique and fashionable touch, while the crewneck adds a classic and timeless element. The side split detail adds an extra flair and makes it easy to style the sweater in different ways. Whether you want to tuck it into jeans or wear it with leggings, this sweater effortlessly elevates any casual outfit. One thing that impressed me about this sweater is its exceptional quality. The stitching is impeccable, and it appears to be well-made and durable. After several washes, it still looks as good as new, with no signs of pilling or fading. This is important to me as it ensures that I will enjoy wearing this sweater for many seasons to come. Another standout feature of this sweater is the range of color options available. Whether you prefer classic neutrals or vibrant hues, there is a shade to suit every taste and style. I opted for the versatile green, and it easily pairs with a variety of bottoms and accessories. In terms of sizing, the oversized fit is true to size, providing a comfortable and relaxed silhouette. I appreciate that the size chart was accurate, ensuring a perfect fit for me. However, if you prefer a more fitted look, consider sizing down. The Sweater has exceeded my expectations in every way. It combines comfort, style, and quality effortlessly. If you're looking for a sweater that is cozy, trendy, and versatile, I highly recommend giving this one a try! Read more
items.author: Katie Wilhoit

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft, Durable, Cute, Wash & Dry, Doesn‚Äôt Pill = Buy
items.body: I love this shirt. It is super soft with thicker material. It great for cooler days with jeans, but can also be worn with jean shorts. It holds it shape after washing-gentle and drying-low heat, and it has not pilled on the sleeves. It is hard to find warmer tops that do not pill, so that is amongst my favorite things about this shirt. It has become a staple item in my closet, making it a great value. I'm 5'7 slender build with a 36 c+. I usually toggle between a small and medium for tops. I bought a SM. It fits perfect. It is not tight in the chest, and it is still loose fitting. The product size suggestion was spot on, as was the chart. Don't leave this one in the cart! Read more
items.author: CA Purchaser

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality made, beautiful sweater.
items.body: Beautiful sweater and received lots of compliments! I ordered a small, but wished they had an XS. It's more of an oversized fit. Very well made, super cute on, not too thick, but not thin, either. Would absolutely recommend and would purchase again. Read more
items.author: Amber

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Looks expensive
items.body: Great value well made soft and coxy will look great with leggings and booties Read more
items.author: Dissatisfied customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flattering and comfortable
items.body: So in love with this sweater ü§ç‚ú® This batwing crewneck is the perfect cozy-chic vibe. The fit is relaxed but super flattering, the material is soft and not itchy at all, a little heavy. It instantly makes any outfit look elevated. Such an easy wardrobe staple ‚Äî highly recommend! Read more
items.author: Holly

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars AI Tiger gone wrong
items.body: It feels amazing, but the Tiger doesn't have a nose. This picture is not an accurate depiction of it. I will likely keep it, hoping no one will notice and because it's so soft, but it's not ok to show a picture and send something that doesn't look like the picture. Read more
items.author: Tigers2000

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So Cute!!!
items.body: Love this sweater! Great quality! Super comfy! And so cute! Read more
items.author: Bianca

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Classy sweater.
items.body: Great quality. Thick material. Terrific fit. Well worth the price. Read more
items.author: Customer

short_description:
Womens Dress Split is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Dress Split is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: 07#plaingreen, Plain Camel, A-green, Strikhaki, 07#cowhiteblue, Bz Red, 07#-plainred, 07#cocoffee, 07#floralcaramel, Aztec Red, Plain Orange, 07#plainapricot, 07#plaincoffee, 07#cobluebrown. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
